member.name: T:DPFP.Capture.EventHandler
member.summary: Defines the fingerprint sample capture operation events

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.EventHandler.OnComplete(System.Object,System.String,DPFP.Sample)
member.summary: Fires when a fingerprint sample is successfully captured by a fingerprint reader
member.param: String that contains the device ID of the fingerprint reader from which the fingerprint sample was captured

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.EventHandler.OnFingerGone(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Fires when a user removes a finger from a fingerprint reader
member.param: String that contains the device ID of the fingerprint reader from which the fingerprint sample was captured

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.EventHandler.OnFingerTouch(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Fires when a user touches a fingerprint reader
member.param: String that contains the device ID of the fingerprint reader from which the fingerprint sample was captured

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.EventHandler.OnReaderConnect(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Fires when a fingerprint reader is attached to a system
member.param: String that contains the device ID of the fingerprint reader from which the fingerprint sample was captured

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.EventHandler.OnReaderDisconnect(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Fires when a fingerprint reader is disconnected from a system
member.param: String that contains the device ID of the fingerprint reader from which the fingerprint sample was captured

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.EventHandler.OnSampleQuality(System.Object,System.String,DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback)
member.summary: Fires when the quality of a fingerprint sample is verified
member.param: String that contains the device ID of the fingerprint reader from which the fingerprint sample was captured

member.name: T:DPFP.Capture.Priority
member.summary: Defines the priority of a fingerprint sample capture operation performed by a fingerprint reader

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.Priority.Low
member.summary: Low priority. An application uses this priority to acquire events from the fingerprint reader only if there are no subscribers with high or normal priority. Only one subscriber with this priority is allowed.

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.Priority.Normal
member.summary: Normal priority. An application uses this priority to acquire events from the fingerprint reader only if the operation runs in a foreground process. Multiple subscribers with this priority are allowed.

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.Priority.High
member.summary: High priority. A subscriber uses this priority to acquire events from the fingerprint reader exclusively. Only one subscriber with this priority is allowed.

member.name: T:DPFP.Capture.Capture
member.summary: Captures a fingerprint sample from a particular fingerprint reader or from all of the fingerprint readers connected to a system

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.Capture.#ctor(System.String,DPFP.Capture.Priority)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Capture class for capturing a fingerprint sample from a particular fingerprint reader using its serial number and specifies any valid value for the priority of the capture operation

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.Capture.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Capture class for capturing a fingerprint sample from a particular fingerprint reader using its serial number and assigns Normal priority to the capture operation.

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.Capture.#ctor(DPFP.Capture.Priority)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Capture class for capturing a fingerprint sample from all of the fingerprint readers connected to a system and specifies any valid value for the priority of the capture operation

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.Capture.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Capture class for capturing a fingerprint sample from any of the fingerprint readers connected to a system and assigns Normal priority to the capture operation.

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.Capture.StartCapture
member.summary: Begins capturing a fingerprint sample from a fingerprint reader. A call to this method is asynchronous and returns immediately. Every call to the StartCapture() method must be paired with a call to the StopCapture() method.

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.Capture.StopCapture
member.summary: Stops the fingerprint sample capture operation started with a call to the StartCapture() method

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.Capture.Dispose
member.summary: Inherited from IDisposable

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.Capture.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Implementation of Disposing pattern Call Dispose(true) from your Dispose() method and finalizer
member.param: Set to true when calling from Dispose() and false when calling from the finalizer

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.Capture.Finalize
member.summary: Terminates Capture

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.Capture.EventHandler
member.summary: Loads a fingerprint sample capture operation event handler. Set this property to null to clear all registered event handlers

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.Capture.ReaderSerialNumber
member.summary: Returns the serial number of a fingerprint reader that captures a fingerprint sample

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.Capture.Priority
member.summary: Returns a value that specifies the priority of a fingerprint sample capture operation

member.name: T:DPFP.DPFPCaptureResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPCaptureResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPCaptureResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPCaptureResources.DPFPErrorMessage_BadEventHandling
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Event Handler has generated an Exception.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPCaptureResources.DPFPErrorMessage_FailedDeviceEnumeration
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to enumerate readers.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPCaptureResources.DPFPErrorMessage_FailedInit
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to initialize.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPCaptureResources.DPFPErrorMessage_FailedtoCreateAcquisition
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to create acquisition.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPCaptureResources.DPFPErrorMessage_FailedtoExportToAnsi
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to export ANSI 381 image.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPCaptureResources.DPFPErrorMessage_FailedtoGetImage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to generate bitmap image.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPCaptureResources.DPFPErrorMessage_FailedtoStartAcquisition
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to start acquisition.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPCaptureResources.DPFPErrorMessage_InvalidReaderIndex
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid index or serial number.

member.name: P:DPFP.DPFPCaptureResources.DPFPErrorMessage_UnknownDevice
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Failed to access the reader.

member.name: T:DPFP.Capture.ReaderSerialNumberType
member.summary: Defines whether a fingerprint reader serial number persists after reboot

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.ReaderSerialNumberType.Persistent
member.summary: A persistent serial number provided by the hardware

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.ReaderSerialNumberType.Volatile
member.summary: A volatile serial number provided by the software

member.name: T:DPFP.Capture.ReaderImpressionType
member.summary: Defines the modality that a fingerprint reader uses to capture fingerprint samples

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.ReaderImpressionType.Unknown
member.summary: A fingerprint reader for which the modality is not known

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.ReaderImpressionType.Swipe
member.summary: A swipe fingerprint reader

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.ReaderImpressionType.Area
member.summary: An area (touch) sensor fingerprint reader

member.name: T:DPFP.Capture.ReaderTechnology
member.summary: Defines the fingerprint reader technology

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.ReaderTechnology.Unknown
member.summary: A fingerprint reader for which the technology is not known

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.ReaderTechnology.Optical
member.summary: An optical fingerprint reader

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.ReaderTechnology.Capacitive
member.summary: A capacitive fingerprint reader

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.ReaderTechnology.Thermal
member.summary: A thermal fingerprint reader

member.name: F:DPFP.Capture.ReaderTechnology.Pressure
member.summary: A pressure fingerprint reader

member.name: T:DPFP.Capture.ReaderVersion
member.summary: Represents information about the fingerprint reader version

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.ReaderVersion.#ctor(System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ReaderVersion class for providing the structure of the fingerprint reader version number

member.summary: Converts ReaderVersion into its string representation

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.ReaderVersion.Build
member.summary: Build number

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.ReaderVersion.Major
member.summary: Major version

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.ReaderVersion.Minor
member.summary: Minor version

member.name: T:DPFP.Capture.ReaderDescription
member.summary: Provides information about a particular fingerprint reader, such as its technology or serial number

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.ReaderDescription.#ctor(System.Guid)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ReaderDescription class using a fingerprint reader’s device GUID

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.ReaderDescription.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ReaderDescription class using a fingerprint reader’s serial number

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.ReaderDescription.Finalize
member.summary: Terminates ReaderDescription

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.ReaderDescription.FirmwareVersion
member.summary: Returns the firmware revision number of a fingerprint reader

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.ReaderDescription.HardwareVersion
member.summary: Returns the hardware revision number of a fingerprint reader

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.ReaderDescription.Language
member.summary: Returns the fingerprint reader language

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.ReaderDescription.ImpressionType
member.summary: Returns a value that specifies the fingerprint reader impression type, for example, swipe reader or touch (area) reader

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.ReaderDescription.ProductName
member.summary: Returns the product name of a fingerprint reader, for example, “U.are.U.”

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.ReaderDescription.SerialNumber
member.summary: Returns the serial number of a fingerprint reader

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.ReaderDescription.SerialNumberType
member.summary: Returns a value that specifies the type of fingerprint reader serial number

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.ReaderDescription.Technology
member.summary: Returns a value that specifies the fingerprint reader technology

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.ReaderDescription.Vendor
member.summary: Returns the vendor name for a fingerprint reader, for example, “DigitalPersona, Inc.”

member.name: T:DPFP.Capture.ReadersCollection
member.summary: Provides information about all of the fingerprint readers connected to a system

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ReadersCollection class for enumerating all of the fingerprint readers connected to a system

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.ReadersCollection.Finalize
member.summary: Terminates ReadersCollection

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.ReadersCollection.Refresh
member.summary: Clears and re-enumerates a ReadersCollection object

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.ReadersCollection.Item(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns a specific ReaderDescription object using its device GUID

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.ReadersCollection.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a specific fingerprint reader using its index

member.name: P:DPFP.Capture.ReadersCollection.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a specific fingerprint reader using its serial number

member.name: T:DPFP.Capture.SampleConversion
member.summary: Provides methods for converting a fingerprint sample to an image in either bitmap image file format or ANSI 381 format

members.member: The fingerprint feature extraction module or the fingerprint comparison module is not initialized.
One or more parameters are not valid.
The called function was not implemented.
A generic I/O file error occurred.
here is not enough memory to perform the action.
The requested device is not known.
The specified fingerprint feature set or fingerprint template buffer size is too small.
The given context is not valid.
The feature set purpose is not valid.
Decrypted fingerprint features are invalid. Decryption may have failed.

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.SampleConversion.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SampleConversion class for converting a fingerprint sample to an image

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.SampleConversion.Finalize
member.summary: Terminates SampleConversion

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.SampleConversion.ConvertToANSI381(DPFP.Sample,System.Byte[]@)
member.summary: Converts a fingerprint sample to an image in ANSI 381 format
member.param: Array of bytes that receives and contains an image in ANSI 381 format

member.name: M:DPFP.Capture.SampleConversion.ConvertToPicture(DPFP.Sample,System.Drawing.Bitmap@)
member.summary: Converts a fingerprint sample to bitmap image file format
member.param: Receives and contains an image in bitmap file format and scales the image to a specified bitmap size, if provided
